actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to extend the benefits of the Veterans Preference Act of 1944 to persons serving in the Armed Forces of the US during peacetime.

summary.text: Extends the benefits of the Veterans' Preference Act of 1944 to those ex-servicemen and women who served on active duty for more than six months in the Armed Forces of the United States during peacetime. (Adds 5 U.S.C. 851(n))

titles.title: A bill to extend the benefits of the Veterans Preference Act of 1944 to persons serving in the Armed Forces of the US during peacetime.
